thread.section_title: Late Night Shows on Huffington Post
thread.title: Jimmy Kimmel's Mean Oscar Tweets Are Award-Winning Nasty
thread.title_full: Jimmy Kimmel's Mean Oscar Tweets Are Award-Winning Nasty

author: The Huffington Post News Team
title: Jimmy Kimmel's Mean Oscar Tweets Are Award-Winning Nasty
text:
Jimmy Kimmel's Mean Oscar Tweets Are Award-Winning Nasty "You're the scum between my toes." 
Host Jimmy Kimmel’s Oscar-version of “Mean Tweets” on Sunday hit A-listers such as Emma Stone and Samuel L. Jackson hard . Many of the barbs from haters on Twitter were of the schoolyard variety, so they were downright mean . 
And on a night of Hollywood self-congratulation ( and chaos ), mean can be funny. ALSO ON HUFFPOST
